page.title: 02R.A.F. Church Fenton-use of
page.content: R. A.F.Church Fenton re-opened in April 1979 for the training of student pilots in Jet Provosts.There are two types of accomodation for officers and two for other ranks,married quarters and individual rooms.About 50% of married men live on the camp the remainder either buy or rent properties in the area. Tours of duty vary between 2 and 5 years. About 150 civilians are employed in the every day running of the camp ie. cleaning, mess stewards, office staff. A civilian bird control unit has been established using falcons.
